name: SURABI CHARITABLE TRUST
briefDescription: Surabi is a registered social organization founded to render valuable services to the human kind categorized its activities under the heads Education and Health.PRESENT ACTIVITIES AT GLANCE:	TYPEWRITING	40 for a 6 month batch.TAILORING	25 women for a 3 month batchCOMPUTER	20 for a 3 month batch.HEALTHY MOTHER	        45 women/ week	BRINDAVAN	14 Children Full time residential care.MEDICAL CAMPS	2/ MonthlyOne camp at Village.BALA KALVI	300 children-Free Note Books.BALA JYOTHI	2 Monthly		Career guidance programBALA MITRA	500 Monthly		Nutrition supplement
